message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it.
You're not being generous enough, Alice. I'll give you a chance to reconsider.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. This is a fair compromise.
You're getting closer, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
Let's call it a draw. We're not getting any closer to an agreement. I'll meet you exactly in the middle this time.
